title: How come I can be on NA Boards whole day for a week
body: and randomly "This site doesn't support my region" pops out? I'm from EUNE and I'm here on NA almost everyday. Do I really have to log out and in every time this happens? Can't Riot fix Boards to be availabe for everyone?

replies.body: That's kind of odd that you'd get that message. Any region is able to post on the NA boards, but I don't think EUNE would be able to post on EUW for example. It looks like it might not be an issue anymore since this post in on the NA boards.
I log out and in again to post it. It wasn't first time I see this massage, but it happens quite randomly and very rarely.
